tool_description: The Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator can be used to calculate BMI value and corresponding weight status while taking age into consideration
name: Body Index Calculator
title: Body Index Calculator

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://body-index-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "body-index-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://body-index-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "body-index-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
